1.0.0.name: connect20/Segmentify_Recommendation_Engine
1.0.0.description: Segmentify for Magento is best conversion optimization application with product recommendation, personalization and real-time analytics capabilities. Segmentify's AI based engine automatically understands user behaviour on your online store and takes actions to increase your sales.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
